actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now recess. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 P.M. today.
The House proceeded with Morning-Hour Debate. At the conclusion of Morning-Hour, the House will recess until 2:00 p.m. for the start of legislative business.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Tim Moore to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
